com.coursera.finaltask.drawexpress

Class LineShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.coursera.finaltask.drawexpress.DrawingShape
      • com.coursera.finaltask.drawexpress.LineShape

  • public class LineShape
extends DrawingShape
    Line shape is used to store informations about line that will be drawn.
    Author:
    Silvio

        public LineShape(Paint paint)

      • LineShape

        public LineShape(Paint paint,
         float startX,
         float startY,
         float endX,
         float endY)
        Creates object with given positions and paint.
        Parameters:
        paint - paint used with this object.
        startX - starting x position of the line.
        startY - starting y position of the line.
        endX - ending x position of the line.
        endY - ending y position of the line.

    • Method Detail

      • getValues

        public float[] getValues()
        Returns Object position values. Returns Object position values in order:
        • float[0] startX
        • float[1] startY
        • float[2] endX
        • float[3] endY
        Specified by:
        getValues in class DrawingShape
        Returns:
        Values in order described above.
